attributes.action: no confidence in the current government led by Prime Minister Keir Starmer.
attributes.additional_details: Parliment must act to restore faith in our political system. The only path forward is to return power to the people, to allow them to have their say on the direction of our country. I move this motion of no confidence and call for a general election, so that the British people can choose a new path and a new government that will truly serve their interests.
attributes.background: The Illegal Migration Act 2023: This legislation is designed to prevent anyone who arrives in the UK through an unauthorized route from claiming asylum. The stated aim is to remove the incentive for people to make dangerous crossings

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
